/maintopic/en/index.html.content: title: Introduction keywords: About, Introduction desc: Information about this website. update: date: 2025 02 21 author: Shimada Mizuki content: Initial writtenã€‚ ## Website Information   "Mizuki's Shorts Museum" is a website dedicated to collecting and popularizing short video culture. Founder: Shimada Mizuki Date of Establishment: 2025 2 19 <del>Address: Shop 114514, Central Street, Daoli District, Harbin City, Heilongjiang Province</del>   Since the author did not have the habit of saving videos in the early days, many media materials were not obtained before they were removed from the shelves (such as videos that Kuaishou has removed from the shelves). If you have relevant materials, please submit them to [my email](mailto:shimadamizuki@qq.com). Submission requirements: The original video link is downloaded or there is no post production modification (with or without short video platform watermark). Powered by teedoc, Github Pages.
